item.title: Adding module links in the back-office side menu
item.description: Adding module links in the back-office side menu On the PrestaShop back office, the links on the side menu are linked to AdminControllers and ModuleAdminController classes. The first ones come from the PrestaShop Core, but the second ones are defined by the modules. If you want to add a link to your ModuleAdminControllers in the back office sidebar, this guide is for you. Tabs registration In order to register new links, open your main module class.

item.title: Override or decorate a Core controller
item.description: Override or decorate a Core controller If you want to extend the behavior of a Back Office page in PrestaShop, you have multiple options. Most of standard extension needs can be fulfilled using one hook. If there is no hook available for your need, and you only need to modify the visual appearance of the page, you might want to override a template. But sometimes you want to modify the page in a deeper way.
